_comment: AddressBook save file which contains the same Place values as in TypicalPlaces#getTypicalAddressBook()

places.name: VivoCity
places.description: Expansive, modern shopping center hosting a wide range of retailers, restaurants & theaters.

places.name: Changi Airport Singapore
places.description: Passenger & cargo hub with 4 modern terminals plus buses & trains to the city center.

places.name: Universal Studios Singapore
places.description: Movie amusement centre with sets & rides on themes from Hollywood to sci-fi, plus live entertainment.

places.name: Yanaka Cemetery Park
places.description: Hilly, cherry tree–planted cemetery with graves of renowned artists & actors & a 5-story pagoda.

places.name: National University of Singapore
places.description: The National University of Singapore is an autonomous research university in Singapore.

places.name: Singapore Zoo
places.description: Rainforest zoo with tram rides, trails & viewing platforms to see wildlife habitats & exhibits.

places.name: Buddha Tooth Relic Temple
places.description: Tang dynasty–style temple housing religious relics, with ornate rooms & a tranquil rooftop garden.
